job.title: Software Engineer - Remote
job.description: <p>Our client has 2 large projects and is looking for Software Engineers to help support them.</p><p><br></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong><u>WHAT YOU’LL DO&nbsp;</u></strong></p><ul><li>Build solutions that meet our customer’s needs and are maintainable, cost-effective and responsive.</li><li>Partner with our product, design and infrastructure teams to build or enhance applications and services.&nbsp;</li><li>Own the reliability of the application and services by partnering. operations and infrastructure to build, scale and monitor services and applications.</li><li>Design, develop, test, debug and maintain software code for our high-performance business applications.</li><li>Analyze and optimize User Interface and Backend Application code for efficiency.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>WHAT YOU'LL NEED</u></strong></p><ul><li>At least 5 years of professional experience building high-performance, reliable systems in a complex, multi-tiered and distributed environment.</li><li>Design and implement services in a variety of programming languages including Nodejs, Golang.</li><li>Successful deployment of production code at scale.</li><li>Proven track record of writing maintainable code which includes unit tests, readable code and decent implementations of design patterns.</li><li>Expertise with learning new technologies and familiarity with our tech stack: JavaScript, Node.js, Go, React.js, ElasticSearch, NSQ, GraphQL and Postgres.</li></ul><p><br></p><p>To schedule an interview with our recruiter, please visit : https://calendly.com/lauren-jessup/vaco_needs</p>
